FAENZAItaly Jun 7-9 2017

Kerning

Divina Proportione

International conference on typography

Kerning is the first international conference in Italy dedicated solely to typography and web typography.

On June 7th and 8th (only workshops) and 9th (conference day) 2017 we will gather in Faenza, in the very heart of Italy, top notch speakers from the whole world of digital and web typography to create an unique event.

Kerning features two days of workshops (June 7th and 8th) and a Conference day full of talks (June 9th). Kerning offers a very interesting chance to meet developers, gurus, managers and innovators from all over the world.

Kerning is a non-profit event. We want to help grow a community of prepared developers keeping knowledge affordable: that’s why normal conference ticket costs just Eur. 195.00 (VAT included).

Calling all type lovers

Speakers

  • Jean François Porchez
  • Marianna Paszkowska
  • Antonio Cavedoni
  • Amélie Bonet
  • Dan Reynolds
  • Lars Harmsen
  • Dan Rhatigan
  • Thomas Phinney
  • Simone Wolf

Workshops

  • Letterbody | LetterSoul with Sumner Stone
  • Printer's Devil with Damiano Bandini
  • How to choose a good font with Bruno Maag and Tom Foley
  • Responsive Web Typography with Richard Rutter
  • A Capital Importance: a Calligraphy workshop with Luca Barcellona

Grab your ticket!

We reserved a few special discounted tickets (79€) for students.

If you are eligible, just send us an email with your ID and a proof you are really a student and we will send you a dedicated link to complete your purchase.
